using namespace std;

int gcd(int a, int b)
{
    if (b == 0)
        return a;
    if (a >= b)
        return gcd(b, a%b);
    else
        return gcd(b, a);
}

int main()
{
	int T;
	scanf("%d", &T);
	for (int t = 0; t < T; t++)
	{
		int M, N;
		scanf("%d %d", &M, &N);
	    int g = gcd(M, N);
		int Mp = M/g;
		int Np = N/g;
        long long ans = (long long)(Np)*(long long)(Mp)*(long long)(g-1)*(long long)(g);
		ans += (long long)(Mp-1)*(long long)(Np-1)*(long long)(g);
		printf("%lld\n", ans);
	}
	return 0;
}
